trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism whereby types can declare that they can receive an expression (or another class) from a markup extension, where the output is a different property type than the target property.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种机制，通过该机制，类型可以声明它们可从标记扩展接收表达式（或另一个类），其中的输出是一个与目标属性不同的属性类型。

trans-unit.source: Do not use for .NET Framework 4 implementations.
trans-unit.target: 请不要用于 .NET Framework 4 实现。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IReceiveMarkupExtension> was a WPF-specific technique for permitting types to enter a different codepath whenever any of its XAML-accessible members where set as markup extensions during XAML parsing.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IReceiveMarkupExtension>已 WPF 特定的方法，以允许将输入不同的代码路径时的任何 XAML 分析期间其中设置作为标记扩展其访问 XAML 成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], this interface is obsolete, and is replaced with a .NET Framework XAML Services implementation for how markup extensions can receive services or types can invoke markup-extension specific setter logic.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、 此接口已过时，并将替换为标记扩展可以如何接收服务的.NET Framework XAML 服务实现或类型可以调用标记扩展特定 setter 逻辑。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] implementations, if types want to perform special processing when setting properties by markup extension rather than by other means, types should be defined with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute> attributes applied.
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]实现中，如果想要按标记扩展而不通过其他方式设置属性时执行特殊的处理类型类型应定义与<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>应用特性。

trans-unit.source: The attribute specifies a callback, which is typically defined as a private member of the type.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定回调，它通常定义为私有成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: In infrastructure implementations of WPF classes, most cases where <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute> is applied reference a `ReceiveMarkupExtension` method that previously implemented this interface, but now instead use context through the callback.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 类的基础结构实现中，大多数情况<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>是应用引用`ReceiveMarkupExtension`方法以前实现此接口，但现在改为使用通过回调的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The name of the target property.
The markup extension instance of the incoming data.
trans-unit.target: 传入数据的标记扩展实例。

trans-unit.source: Can provide additional services that should be performed when processing the markup extension data for a property value.
trans-unit.target: 可以提供附加服务，在为属性值处理标记扩展数据时，应执行这些服务。

trans-unit.source: Provides the handling for markup extensions that provide property values.
trans-unit.target: 对提供属性值的标记扩展提供处理。

trans-unit.source: Do not use for [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementations; see <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.IReceiveMarkupExtension" />.
trans-unit.target: 请不要用于 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 实现；请参阅 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.IReceiveMarkupExtension" />。
